attributes.action: pass a law allowing the naming of under 18's who have been involved/found guilty of taking part in serious offences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Day by day the media report oncases where youths have been involved in crime yet due to their age cannot be named. perhaps if these individuals were named and shamed and there for everyone to see it might make them consider thier actions.
